body_html:
In v0.12.0 this is a fatal error when using libtensorflow for go: Op BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 17. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().

Using optimize_for_inference allows me to load the model:
optimize_for_inference --input=/tmp/output_graph.pb --output=/tmp/output_graph.pb_optimised --frozen_graph=True --input_names=Mul --output_names=final_result
body_text:
In v0.12.0 this is a fatal error when using libtensorflow for go: Op BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 17. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().
Using optimize_for_inference allows me to load the model:
optimize_for_inference --input=/tmp/output_graph.pb --output=/tmp/output_graph.pb_optimised --frozen_graph=True --input_names=Mul --output_names=final_result
body:
In v0.12.0 this is a fatal error when using libtensorflow for go: Op BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 17. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().

Using optimize_for_inference allows me to load the model:
optimize_for_inference --input=/tmp/output_graph.pb --output=/tmp/output_graph.pb_optimised --frozen_graph=True --input_names=Mul --output_names=final_result
